unnormalised: **EdTech Update: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to a Brighter Future, Yaar!**
normalised: **EdTech Update: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to a Brighter Future, Yaar!**

unnormalised: Feeling the pinch of those tuition fees, huh? Don't worry, scholarship portals are here to rescue you! Think of them as online treasure troves brimming with opportunities to fund your education dreams.
normalised: Feeling the pinch of those tuition fees, huh? Do not worry, scholarship portals are here to rescue you! Think of them as online treasure troves brimming with opportunities to fund your education dreams.

unnormalised: These platforms are becoming increasingly popular in India, connecting students like Rohan from Delhi with scholarships ranging from Rs. 50,000 to even covering entire degree programs at IIT Madras or Delhi University. They list opportunities from various organizations – government, private, even international!
normalised: These platforms are becoming increasingly popular in India, connecting students like Rohan from Delhi with scholarships ranging from rupee fifty thousand to even covering entire degree programs at I I T Madras or Delhi University. They list opportunities from various organizations – government, private, even international!

unnormalised: Many portals offer personalized matching services, suggesting scholarships based on your profile and academic records. Just imagine, a portal highlighting a scholarship for underprivileged students from Bihar, submitted by 17/02/2023 – wouldn't that be amazing for someone like Priya?
normalised: Many portals offer personalized matching services, suggesting scholarships based on your profile and academic records. Just imagine, a portal highlighting a scholarship for underprivileged students from Bihar, submitted by seventeenth february two thousand and twenty three – would not that be amazing for someone like Priya?

unnormalised: So, ditch the endless Google searches and head over to one of these portals. The application deadlines are approaching fast, many around 16:00 hrs on 28/07/2024. Start exploring today at 10:00 hrs and maybe, just maybe, you'll find that golden ticket. Education's getting easier, thanks to these portals! Time to chalo and check 'em out!
normalised: So, ditch the endless Google searches and head over to one of these portals. The application deadlines are approaching fast, many around four P M on twenty eighth july two thousand and twenty four. Start exploring today at ten A M and maybe, just maybe, you will find that golden ticket. Education is getting easier, thanks to these portals! Time to chalo and check 'em out!
